thread.title: Great place to stay
thread.title_full: Great place to stay - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SheffieldTrev
title: Great place to stay
text:
Great hotel, positioned well , central for everything, two minute walk to Times Square, grand central, subway etc. Nice entrance area and lobby, staff brilliant, very helpful, guy on reception, didn't,t get his name but so funny and nice, as we're the rest of the staff we encountered from in the bar to the room cleaners, all very professional but at the same time friendly and casual if you want to chat or engage in conversation, would definitely be returning.
Room Tip: We were on floor 9 looking inwards so no traffic noise, could hear the air on system outside but nev... See more room tips
